meaning list.sentence: I wanted to apply for that job, but the ship has sailed.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bëggoon naa dugal sama këyit ci liggéey boobu, waaye liggéey bi dafa dem.

meaning list.sentence: The time is ripe to start your own business.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dafa jot nga tàmbali sa liggéey.

meaning list.sentence: He’s great at thinking on his feet during meetings.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dafa baax lool ci xalaat bu gaaw te baax ci ndaje yi.

meaning list.sentence: In this day and age, technology is essential for communication.
meaning list.sentence translation: Leegi xarala yu bees yi dañu am solo ci jokkoo.

meaning list.sentence: She was tickled pink when she received the surprise gift.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kontaan na lool biñu ko joxee kado bu yéeme bi.

meaning list.sentence: They’re planning to tie the knot next spring.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dañu nara sëy ci pringtemps bi jubsi.

word: time after time (time and time again)

meaning list.sentence: Time after time, he proved that he could be trusted.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dafa wane ni mën nañu ko wóolu yoon yu bari.

meaning list.sentence: Time flies when you’re having fun.
meaning list.sentence translation: Sooy féexal sa xol, waxtu wi dafay gaawa romb.

meaning list.sentence: After years in the same job, it’s time for a change.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ginaaw ay at ci benn liggéey, jotna nga soppi.

word: time heals all wounds (or time is a great healer)

meaning list.sentence: Don’t worry; time heals all wounds.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bul jaaxle; Jamono dafay faj lépp.

meaning list.sentence: Let’s not waste time; time is money.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bunu yàq jotu; Waxtu lu am solo la.

meaning list.sentence: Time is of the essence, so we need to act quickly.
meaning list.sentence translation: Jamono mooy li am solo, kon dañu wara gaaw def dara.

meaning list.meaning: Jamono ji gëna baax ci sa dundu (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: We had the time of our lives on our vacation.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ci vacance yi lanu neexee ci sunu dundu.

meaning list.sentence: Now that he’s retired, he has time on his hands.
meaning list.sentence translation: Leegi bimu wàccee ci liggéey bi, amna jotu liggéey bu bari.

meaning list.meaning: Mënul wax ndax mbégte wala njàqare (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: He was tongue-tied during the interview.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mënul woon wax ci biir interview bi ndax bànneex.

word: too many chiefs and not enough Indians
phonetic american: tuː ˈmɛni tʃiːfs ənd nɑːt ɪˈnʌf ˈɪndiənz
phonetic british: tuː ˈmɛni tʃiːfs ənd nɒt ɪˈnʌf ˈɪndiənz

meaning list.meaning: Njiit yu bari waaye liggéeykat yu doyul (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: The project failed because there were too many chiefs and not enough Indians.
meaning list.sentence translation: Projet bi dafa lajj ndax njiit yi bariwoon nañu lool waaye liggéeykat yi doyul woon.

word: too much (free) time on one's hands
phonetic american: tuː mʌtʃ taɪm ɑn wʌnz hændz
phonetic british: tuː mʌtʃ taɪm ɒn wʌnz hændz

meaning list.meaning: Am jotu yewwute bu bari diko yàq (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: He started spreading rumors because he has too much time on his hands.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bimu amee jot lu bari, mu tàmbali tasaare kilima.

meaning list.sentence: He’s the top banana in the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mooy njiitu liggéeyukaay bi.

meaning list.meaning: Nit ku gëna am doole wala ku am ndam (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: After winning the competition, he became the top dog in his field.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ginaaw bimu amee ndam ci competition bi, ci la nekk ki gëna am doole ci wàllam.

meaning list.meaning: Nit ku am doole te mëna jànkoonte ak jafe-jafe (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: She’s a tough cookie; she never gives up.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nit ku am doole la, mën a jànkoonte ak jafe-jafe; Du xàddi mukk.

meaning list.meaning: Xam-xam bu amul fenn wala pexe yu ñuy jëfandikoo ci benn liggéey (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: He learned the tricks of the trade from his mentor.
meaning list.sentence translation: Jàngoon na jafe-jafe yi ci liggéey bi ci njiitam.

meaning list.meaning: Wane jikko dëgg wala mébetu nit (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: She showed her true colours when she refused to help.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dafa wane meloom dëgg bimu bañee jàppale.

word: turn back the hands of time
phonetic american: tɜːrn bæk ðə hændz əv taɪm
phonetic british: tɜːn bæk ðə hændz əv taɪm

meaning list.meaning: Dellu ci jamono yi weesu wala dellu ci jamono (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: If I could turn back the hands of time, I’d make a different decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: Suma mënoon delloosi jamono, damay jël beneen dogal.

meaning list.sentence: He never went to college but learned everything from the university of life.
meaning list.sentence translation: Demul universite, waaye jàng na lépp ci àdduna.

meaning list.sentence: You can wait until hell freezes over, but I won’t change my mind.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mën nga xaar ba fàww waaye duma soppi sama xalaat.

meaning list.meaning: dara luy dem ba yàqu wala luy ñàkk (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: All our hard work went up in smoke when the project was canceled.
meaning list.sentence translation: Sunu liggéey bu metti bi dafa yàqu ginaaw bi ñu fomme projet bi.

meaning list.sentence: She’s waiting in the wings for a chance to prove herself.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mingi xaar jot ngir wane boppam.

meaning list.sentence: He walked out on his family when things got tough.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bi mbir yi metti, mu bàyyi njabootam.

meaning list.sentence: We’re wasting time discussing irrelevant issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: Danuy yàq sunu jotu waxtaan ci mbir yu amul njariñ.

meaning list.meaning: Sistem wala kuréel guy dox bu baax (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: The team works like a well-oiled machine.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ekip bi dafay dox ni sistem buy dox bu baax.

meaning list.sentence: We had a whale of a time at the amusement park.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nu neex lool ci park amusement bi.

meaning list.meaning: Lewet lool ndax tiitaange wala feebar (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: He turned white as a sheet when he heard the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bimu déggee xibaar bi, mu lewet.

meaning list.meaning: liggéeykat ci buro, nit kuy def liggéeyu xel (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: White-collar jobs are becoming more common in urban areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: Liggéeyu koliye weex dafa gëna bari ci dëkki taax yi.

meaning list.meaning: Luy njëg lu bari waaye amul njariñ (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: The stadium turned out to be a white elephant for the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: Stade bi dafa seer lool waaye amul benn njariñ ci dëkk bi.

meaning list.meaning: Fen bu amul benn loraange wala bu am mébet bu baax (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: She told a white lie to avoid hurting his feelings.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mu fen tuuti ngir moytu gaañ xolam.

meaning list.sentence: The company tried to whitewash the scandal.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kompani bi dafa jéema nëbb jafe-jafe yi.

meaning list.sentence: When they throw a party, they go the whole nine yards with decorations and food.
meaning list.sentence translation: Suñu amalee feet, dañuy génn ànd ak dekoraasioŋ ak lekk.

meaning list.meaning: Ak mbégte ak mbégte bu rëy (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: I’ll be at your party with bells on!
meaning list.sentence translation: Dinaa ñëw ci sa feet ak mbégte bu rëy!

meaning list.meaning: Prix wala titre bi ñuy jox ki mujjee ñëw (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: They were awarded the wooden spoon for finishing last in the league.
meaning list.sentence translation: Jox nañu leen neexal kuddu dénk ndax ñoo mujjee nekk ci liig bi.

meaning list.sentence: This new cleaning product works like a charm.
meaning list.sentence translation: Produit de nettoyage bu bees bii dafay dox bu baax.

meaning list.meaning: Duma musa def wala nekk ci jafe-jafe (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: I wouldn’t be caught dead wearing that outfit.
meaning list.sentence translation: Duma musa sol yéere yooyu.

meaning list.meaning: Baamtu, at ci ganaw at, ay at (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: They visit the same beach year in, year out.
meaning list.sentence translation: At mu nekk dañuy dem ci benn tefes gi.

meaning list.sentence: He’s too yellow-bellied to confront his boss.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dafa ragal lool ba mënu jàkkarloo ak kilifaam.

word: you can't teach an old dog new tricks
phonetic american: juː kænt tiːʧ ən oʊld dɔːɡ nuː trɪks
phonetic british: juː kɑːnt tiːʧ ən əʊld dɒɡ njuː trɪks

meaning list.meaning: Soppi nit ku am jikko yu yàgg lu jafe la (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: He refuses to learn how to use a smartphone; you can’t teach an old dog new tricks.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dafa bañ jàng ni ñuy jëfandikoo telefon bu xarañ; Soppi jikko yu yàgg lu jafe la.

word: your guess is as good as mine
phonetic american: jʊr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn
phonetic british: jɔːr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn

meaning list.meaning: Xamuma itam, sunu ñaari xalaat mën nañu tolloo dëgg (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: Why the train is late? Your guess is as good as mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lu tax saxaar gi yeex? Man itam xamuma.
